reviewText: This is an excellent CD of exercises if you are handicapped and must do exercises sitting down.  I recommend it.
i have Dr. Chen's other DVDs.  This exercise DVD is too easy for me, but could help others.  Give it a try.
This qi gong DVD is straight forward, easy to follow and great for anyone who is chair bound. Worth getting if you are in a chair or know someone who could use it.
I assumed that these exercises would move at Yoga speed. My fault. The demonstator moves a little too fast for me. It is an extensive set of exercises.
